description: This table contains information from pharmacy claims. Each record represents one pharmacy claim in the managed care system's AP Claims module.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record

columns.name: RX_BATCH_NUM
columns.description: National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP) file batch number

columns.name: RX_SUBMISSION_NUM
columns.description: NCPDP file submission number.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_EXT_CODE_LST_ID
columns.description: Identifies the status of the pharmacy claim (paid, reversed, canceled, etc.). The record status code can be retrieved by joining this column to the EXT_CODE_LST_ID column in table FCL_EXTRNL_CDE_LST.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_EXT_CODE_LST_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: REJECT_OVRIDE_EXT_CODE_LST_ID
columns.description: Indicates reason for paying a pharmacy claim when override is used. The reject override code can be retrieved by joining this column to the EXT_CODE_LST_ID column in table FCL_EXTRNL_CDE_LST.

columns.name: REJECT_OVRIDE_EXT_CODE_LST_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: Pharmacy associated to the claim.

columns.name: PRESC_PROV_ID
columns.description: Prescribing provider.

columns.name: PRESC_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: Stores the prescribing provider's taxonomy code for pharmacy claims.

columns.name: TTL_INGRED_COST_PAID
columns.description: Drug ingredient cost paid.

columns.name: TTL_DISPENSING_FEE_PAID
columns.description: Dispensing fee paid.

columns.name: TTL_REG_TAX_AMT_PAID
columns.description: Flat sales tax amount paid.

columns.name: TTL_PCT_TAX_AMT_PAID
columns.description: Percentage tax amount paid.

columns.name: TTL_INCENTIVE_AMT_PAID
columns.description: Incentive amount paid.

columns.name: TTL_PROF_SVC_FEE_PAID
columns.description: Professional service fee paid.

columns.name: OTHER_AMT_RECOGNIZED
columns.description: Total amount recognized by the processor of any payment from another source.

columns.name: ALTERNATE_CLM_IDENT
columns.description: Alternate Claim ID

columns.name: REF_CLAIM_IDENT
columns.description: Reference claim ID for the original claim

columns.name: WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
Claim workflow type (AP claim, paid claim, estimate claim, etc.)


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


AP claims


Reprice claims


Export only


Shadow claims


Paid claims


Paid claims with bucket update


Pre-adjudicated external claims


Estimate claims


Adjudicated external claims

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: Coverage used to pay the claim

columns.name: PAYER_SEQ_NUMBER_C_NAME
columns.description:
Sequence number of the payer of the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Primary


Secondary


Tertiary


Quaternary


Quinary


Senary


Septenary


Octonary


Nonary


Denary


Undenary

columns.name: OWN_BUSINESS_SEGMENT_POS_ID
columns.description: Stores the business segment ID that owns the claim record.

columns.name: CLM_SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: This item stores the business segment or service area of the claim.

columns.name: CLM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Claim status


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New


Pending


Denied


Clean


Void

columns.name: STATUS_SET_DATE
columns.description: Date when claim status was updated

columns.name: RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: The date the claim was received

columns.name: ADJUD_DTTM
columns.description: Adjudication date and time

columns.name: SERVICE_START_DATE
columns.description: Service start date for the claim

columns.name: SERVICE_END_DATE
columns.description: Service end date for the claim

columns.name: TTL_DEDUCTIBLE
columns.description: Total deductible

columns.name: TTL_COPAY
columns.description: Total copay

columns.name: TTL_COINS
columns.description: Total coinsurance

columns.name: TTL_PAT_AMT
columns.description: Total patient amount

columns.name: TTL_PRIM_INS_AMT
columns.description: Total prior insurance amount

columns.name: TTL_BILLED
columns.description: Total billed amount

columns.name: TTL_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: Total allowed amount

columns.name: TTL_NET_PAYABLE
columns.description: Total net payable

columns.name: ORIG_OF_REV_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: If this claim is a reversal claim, this column contains the ID of the claim reversed by this claim.

columns.name: ADJUST_BY_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: If this claim has been adjusted, this column contains the ID of the claim which adjusts this claim.

columns.name: ORIG_OF_ADJUST_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: If this claim adjusts another claim, this column contains the ID of the claim adjusted by this claim.

columns.name: TTL_PRIM_PAT_DEDUCTIBLE
columns.description: Total prior patient deductible

columns.name: TTL_PRIM_PAT_COPAY
columns.description: Total prior patient copay

columns.name: TTL_PRIM_PAT_COINS
columns.description: Total prior patient coinsurance

columns.name: UNBALANCED_AMOUNTS_YN
columns.description:
Identifies whether the adjustment claim was received with credit/debit information that reflect the adjusted amount as opposed to new claim amounts.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: INVALID_CLM_YN
columns.description:
If the system determined we cannot trust the claim's data for reporting or clinical purposes, this column will store Y (invalid). Otherwise it will be N (valid) or NULL (has not been evaluated by the system). This column's value can be overridden by AP_CLM_RX.OVERRIDE_INVALID_CLM_YN.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNBALANCED_AMOUNTS_YN

columns.name: OVERRIDE_INVALID_CLM_YN
columns.description:
Overrides the INVALID_CLM_YN column and determines if we cannot trust the claim's data for reporting or clinical purposes. This column will store Y if overridden to invalid, N if overridden to valid, or NULL if validity has not been overridden and the value in AP_CLM_RX.INVALID_CLM_YN will be used.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNBALANCED_AMOUNTS_YN

columns.name: IS_INVLD_ADJ_SEQ_RX_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a claim is part of an adjustment sequence that is not valid. An adjustment sequence can be invalid for a number of reasons, such as the sequence ending in a cancellation or the sequence having gaps.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNBALANCED_AMOUNTS_YN

columns.name: TOT_NOT_COVERED_AMT
columns.description: Total not covered amount

columns.name: MEDICARE_DRUG_CVG_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code to distinguish if a claim was paid under Medicare Part B or Part D.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Medicare Part D


Medicare Part B

columns.name: REC_OWN_BUSSEG_POS_ID
columns.description: The owning business segment received for this claim. This might differ from the owning business segment in I CLM 18026 based on the adjustment sequence that this claim is in.
